name: Dream Machine (Source In Form Of Revolution)
name_original: Dream Machine (Source In Form Of Revolution)
description:
This game will subconsciously inspire you to find out your dreams and goals. It is designed to loop the actual reflection of life spiral events that we are going through as beings in this world.

Purify: To stand against all that stops you from self realisations.

Growth: Growing after realising the limitless possibilities that we have to achieve what we desire.

Falling: Falling again and learning from our mistakes.

This game requires you to play it for 21 days in order to start giving its maximum effect on your mind to believe in yourself more and more!
